import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./Calculator.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Calculator(){//Python vars
const[apiData,setApiData]=useState(null);const[inputData,setInputData]=useState('');const[processedResult,setProcessedResult]=useState(null);//Get from python
useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('http://localhost:8000/api/data');const data=await response.json();setApiData(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching data:',error);}};fetchData();},[]);//Send to python
const handleProcessData=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('http://localhost:8000/api/process_data',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({input:inputData})});const data=await response.json();setProcessedResult(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error processing data:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Calculator",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Maths equations (Python)"}),apiData&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:apiData.message}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:inputData,onChange:e=>setInputData(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleProcessData,children:"Process Data"}),processedResult&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Processed: ",JSON.stringify(processedResult)]})]})]});}export default Calculator;
